review: Got a Pretty Amazing Deal and with free shipping it costs me $25. I would have bought an apple tv if it was that cheap as I needed it for basically mirroring purposes. Although it needs refinement, it's a great cheap alternative to apple tv. I'll wait for the next apple tv  to come and till then see if this improves or not. Streaming through casting is nice although tab casting lags most of the time even though I have 60/30 mbps internet connection and the latest gigabit ac router.Also my internet was 20/5 before and it lagged so much but after upgrading my internet, which costs me only $5 extra, it works quite fine with 480p direct tab casting and streaming is perfect and smooth. 720p still needs work as sometimes the frames get slow.Basically your computer uploads the tab on the internet and then chromecast downloads it from google's servers. There is no actual mirroring going on like apple tv does, so the router doesn't matter but the internet speed does.

review: Product works exactly as advertised!!  I purchased it for a Toshiba 720p 32" LED TV.  I had read some reviews that they might  not work on 720p displays so I called Amazon to get some feedback.  And, as always, Amazon was able to answer each and every question I had regarding this Google product.  The Amazon rep had a Chromecast and a 720 p tv and they interacted without issue for him.  (one of the many reasons I love Amazon.com)  Highly recommend the Google Chromecast.
